title.rendered: Value Education session for students in Amreli

content.rendered:
Some 1200 students from class 1 to 10 from one of the Modi Group of Schools, along with their teachers, joined Smile Foundation’s value education session conducted under Child for Child (CFC) programme at Amreli in Gujarat.

Komal Talsaniya from Smile Foundation conducted the session, which was appreciated whole-heartedly by the children, teachers as well as the school management.

CFC has been designed for bringing children from both the worlds together, sensitising the privileged children about the life and aspiration of their less privileged counterparts and encouraging them for growing up as responsible citizens to build a better society.
